Dboost.description: Taking damage launches the player upwards. Taking hits from enemies in key locations can allow you to reach heights otherwise impossible.

IframeReset.description: Opening the inventory while you have iframes will reset them, allowing you to take damage again. This is useful for repeated damage boosts, making some jumps possible which otherwise wouldn't be. (In commerical releases, this technique requires the Map System.)

SisterSkip.description: H/V triggers take some time to propagate. This fact can be abused to avoid certain H/V triggers by jumping out of their way.

SNMissiles.description: The Missile Launcher can break blocks with its limited ammo.

SNBubbler.description: The Bubbler can break blocks at Level 3. Be careful, as de-leveling your Bubbler may result in softlocks.

BossMissiles.description: Some bosses have anti-missile behavior which can be circumvented in certain situations.

GravHop.description: Holding the jump button in midair reduces the effects of gravity. Tapping the jump button quickly then holding it can allow you to make certain jumps that would not be possible with a normal jump.

pacifist.description: Many areas with enemies can be traversed safely with clever movement, even without a weapon to kill enemies.

Combat.description: A higher combat trick will require you to beat bosses with less HP than usual.
